data.title: Juhi Name Meaning in English & Urdu, Origin, Luck Number
data.meta_description: Juhi is a Muslim Arabic baby girl name. Its meaning is "Fragrant Flower". Juhi name origin is Arabic. Write Juhi in Urdu, Hindi, Arabic, Bangla : جوہی, जूही, جوهي,جوھی, জুহি., Baby names meaning in Urdu, Hindi
data.text:
Juhi Name Meaning in English

What does the name Juhi mean? What is the meaning of the name Juhi, lucky number, lucky stone, origin and religion.

Juhi (Nepali: जूही) is a Nepalese and North Indian given name, which means "jasmine flower".

Juhi Name Meaning, Origin & Details

Meaning: Fragrant flower Gender: Girl Origin: Arabic Religion: Muslim Suitable for: Girls / Female / Women Hardness: Easy to pronounce, Juhi is a short name Uniqueness: It is a common name Short & Easy: Yes Syllables: 4 Letters and 1 Words

Juhi Name Numerology And Personality

Juhi has the numerology 4. These people are always trying new things and that is why they are known to be struggling against all the limits that are put in front of them. They do not let anything stop them and they literally fight with everything that comes their way.

The people with numerology 4 are one of a kind because they are very different from normal people. The gender of this name Juhi is Girl. They are the ones who know the value of foundation. They are also very kind with their services and they generally like to help people.

They also do not believe in jumping to the top and coming down quickly rather they believe in steady growth in every aspect. The meaning of this beautiful name is Fragrant flower. The religion is Muslim. These are the people who are more prone towards slow growth but the steady one rather than immediately reaching the top and coming to bottom the very next day.
